text: Polyalthia shendurunii is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Kerala in India.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Polyalthia shendurunii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==References== shendurunii Category:Flora of Kerala Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Polyalthia shendurunii
